summary: A small numerical change to Skyrim\'s INI that has eradicated crashing on my heavily modded Skyrim install.
descriptionHtml:
In the Skyrim INI change 

uExterior Cell Buffer=36 ( default )

to uExterior Cell Buffer=24

This has eliminated exterior crashing for me completely. Havent crashed in 3 weeks. Before this tweak I was lucky if I could go an hour. 

The major mods I am using are 2k Textures full, SkyRe, Frostfall, Skyrim Immersive Creatures, Interesting NPC\'s, and ASIS with Increased Spawns. 

As a disclaimer I have no idea what this tweak will do to your game. I seem to be able to freely change this value without issue.
author: 1erCru
